## Terms {#sec-geo-anal-terms .unnumbered}

-   [**Catchment**]{style="color: #009499"} - refers to the sphere of influence from which a retail location, such as a shopping center, or service, such as a hospital, is likely to draw its customers. (also see [Retail](Retail) \>\> Catchment)
